description.RU:
IS-2 Berlin reskin based on Nonna’s IS-2 model 1944, from Girls und Panzer, der Film

This is it’s form from the movie, in summer colours, used by Pravda during the exhebition match against Ooarai, and in the Annihilation match against Selection university

edit

It’s illegal to monetise this stuff because Girls und Panzer is copyrighted and belongs to Girls und Panzer Projekt

Download and use only for non profit purposes

Download the zip file, extract the folder called “vehicles” inside and add it to here:

C:\Games\World_of_Tanks\res_mods\1.0.0.1

if you alredy have an existing “vehicles” and “russian” folder, open the mod and extract the file “R71_IS_2_Berlin” to the “russian” folder you alredy have

If you have any other skins for the IS-2 Berlin there you’ll have to move them somewhere else (duh)

name.RU: Nonna's IS-2 Berlin, as seen in the GuP Film
